name: Missile Launch 3D
description:
Are you ready for an adventurous 3D missile game? Launch and guide your missile to destroy the alien sphere. Avoid all red objects. Stop the alien invasion now!

Destroy the alien sphere with your smart missile to stop the invasion. Guide your missile to reach the target! The alien sphere is a communication device for the aliens to call alien reinforcements. If aliens reach our planet, we are doomed. That's why we want to destroy all communication spheres!

Red obstacles are preventing your smart missile to reach the target: alien sphere. The white objects can help you move or push the red obstacles so that you can path your way and reach the sphere.

How to play? Three ways to do it: 1. Swipe to move (left / right)
2. Tap to move (left/ right)
3. Hold and slide (left / right)

There's a progress bar in each level to follow your progress!
Reach the highest level possible. Each level has its unique design and difficulty sets with fun, interacting elements.

Warning: insanely addictive!

When you play Missile Launch 3D, the white objects can help tremendously. Unlike the red objects, the white ones are not your enemy. The white ones can help you push or move away the red ones, critical to complete levels in the game. When touch a red asset, the rocket fails to reach the target, therefore the towers remain intact and the game is over.

More levels coming soon!

It's FREE to PLAY!
Enjoy! Have fun and play now!
P.S. If you like this Missile Launch 3D game, please rate it!
